text: Alexey Andreyevich Chernyshyov (; born in 29 March 1939) is a Russian politician who served as the 2nd Governor of Orenburg Oblast, Russia. He is a member of the Agrarian Party of Russia. He became the head of the oblast government in 1999. Chernyshyov is active in promoting Russia-Kazakhstan trade as Orenburg Oblast shares a long border with Kazakhstan. == References == * Official website of Orenburg Oblast. Governor of Orenburg Oblast * State Duma. title: Alexey Chernyshyov
